column1: Smoque BBQ////I was really excited to make my first trip to Smoque after reading all the accolades it's received. I was concerned about how long the wait would be on a Friday so I got there around 6:15 with two of my friends. Fortunately
column2: the restaurant was only 50% full! When you walk in you let the guy know how many people you have if you're eating in and he'll tell you which table is yours. Next
column3: you order your food at the counter and you get a number which they'll call out when your food is done.
